title: Recieved LeaverBuster when I did not AFK or leave the game ??!!

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body:
Yo Riot, I didn't AFK, I didn't recieve the warning message, in my last game before the punishment I stood on the platform (at my keyboard) and waited for them to push down mid after my support ran into the enemy and died (twice), I was happy to play out a 4v5 but after our jungler proved to not quite have his 'head in the game' I decided it wasn't worth my time. 

I stood on the platform moving around, didn't receive and warning messages and then get a Leaver buster at the end of the game which has given me 20 minutes of punishment time b4 I can start my queue. 

Are you trying to discourage opening lanes to quicken a game? if so but you still have no grounds to stand on here since I received no prior warning and did not stand in 1 place doing nothing for any significant amount of time. I don't want to play out losses, ty.

replies.body:
> I stood on the platform moving around

Leaver Buster doesn't just punish people that are literally afk or disconnected. People that are not participating in the match by *idling* like this will be punished as well. If you do not want to play the match to completion then you vote for a surrender; if the surrender vote isn't successful then you are obligated to play out the rest. If you don't want to play the match then you'll have to deal with the low priority queue when you abandon the teammates that want to continue the game. It *is* possible to win 4v5's.

Read more about Leaver Buster here; https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ

I see, ty. 

One of the points I was making is that I'm happy to play out 4v5s but it became a 3v5 since our jungler essentially started trolling. I don't care what's in the rules it's dumb to force someone to play out that kind of a game. Don't expect players to play out games that are clear losses

It seems they never revert LeaverBusters on accounts from what I read, I don't know if that's due to Riot's famously bad coding or if they honestly don't think anyone should have it reverted, either way that in itself is far more toxic for the community than people opening lanes for quicker games.
